name: Ultimate Match-Three
description:
Looking for a new addictively match 3 game?
Ultimate Match-Three is the MOST exciting puzzle adventure on mobile today!

Swap, draw a line or tap on the fruits of the same colors to create unique boosters with special matching combinations. Use boosters for huge explosions to blast your way through thousands of levels! But match carefully – it’s not so easy when you have limited moves or have to race against the clock!

Dash through the puzzles alone or challenge friends to see who can get the highest score. There are countless possibilities, and your talent in solving puzzles will be key in mastering Ultimate Match-Three. Match the fruits and enjoy this fun and free puzzle game.

FEATURES:

● Three unique gameplays in one game: swap and match, line and blast, tap and crush!
● Never-ending fun with lots of challenging levels!
● Numerous boosters and powerful combos like Tornado, Firework, Pearl, Surprice and more!
● Unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
● Daily prizes from the Spin Wheel!
● New levels added weekly!
● Connect to Facebook to seamless sync across multiple devices and challenge friends!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

LET’S GO ULTIMATE MATCH-THREE!
